sources.title: Lloyd the Conqueror | Full Comedy Movie | Evan Williams
sources.description:
Lloyd the Conqueror - Three male college students, must do battle against Derek the Unholy, a dark wizard who is determined to hold onto his title as champion of the Larpers.
2011.  Stars: Brian Posehn, Mike Smith, Evan Williams
